message.body: $AAPL $SPY 'Selling more of lower cost LCD models limit Apples ability to increase average iPhone selling prices https://www.wsj.com/articles/iphone-x-pensive-apple-looks-to-keep-phones-with-cheaper-displays-1529051835

links.title: iPhone X-Pensive: Apple Looks to Keep Phones With Cheaper Displays
links.description: Apple is developing production plans for its next iPhones that stress cheaper liquid-crystal displays more than analysts had expected, showing consumers' sensitivity to the price of smartphones.

messages.body: $AAPL TRADE WARS!!!
$AAPL https://www.cnbc.com/2018/06/26/youtuber-joins-apple-in-developing-vr-for-self-driving-cars.html

links.title: A YouTube star with more than 3 million followers has reportedly been working at Apple in secret
links.description: YouTube star Mark Rober, best known for his DIY science videos, has been helping Apple develop virtual reality for entertainment in self-driving cars, according to patent filings that were first reported by Variety. Rober, who has more than 3.4 million YouTube followers, left stints at NASA and Morph Costumes to take a job in 2015 at an unknown company, according to his LinkedIn.

links.title: Is it time to give up on this bull market?
links.description: The S&P500 treaded water Tuesday, the day after the biggest drop in a couple of months. Volume was average, but it was similar to Monday's relatively benign volumes. Trade tensions flared up over the weekend as Trump and China continue escalating their rhetoric.
